languages.text:
"Их {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}роль исполнена{/d}, Купец Бездомный,
Не мне менять ее и не тебе.
Ее решил сценарий вероломный,
Поставив точку в их лихой судьбе".

traits.locale_text:
"Их роль исполнена, Купец Бездомный,
Не мне менять ее и не тебе.
Ее решил сценарий вероломный,
Поставив точку в их лихой судьбе".
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."
languages.original_text:
"Их {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}роль исполнена{/d}, Купец Бездомный,
Не мне менять ее и не тебе.
Ее решил сценарий вероломный,
Поставив точку в их лихой судьбе".

traits.locale_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“四处漂泊的商人啊，他们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}已至终局{/d}。
精心设计的剧本，导演着这场大戏，
将所有人的命运，抛向滂沱的暴雨。
这一切安排，没有你我插手的余地。”
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
“四处漂泊的商人啊，他们已至终局。
精心设计的剧本，导演着这场大戏，
将所有人的命运，抛向滂沱的暴雨。
这一切安排，没有你我插手的余地。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«Mi Mercader Errante, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}tu parte ha concluido{/d}:
no nos corresponde a nosotros criticar
el artístico guion que esta farsa ha decidido
ni tu exclusión hacia un tormentoso final».
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
«Mi Mercader Errante, su parte ha concluido:
no nos corresponde a nosotros criticar
el artístico guion que esta farsa ha decidido
ni su exclusión hacia un tormentoso final».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「放浪せし商人よ、彼らの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}役は幕を閉じた{/d}
彼らを書き出す小芝居の脚本は
僕も君も軽視はできない
嵐の運命に身をゆだねよ」
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
「放浪せし商人よ、彼らの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}役は幕を閉じた{/d}
彼らを書き出す小芝居の脚本は
僕も君も軽視はできない
嵐の運命に身をゆだねよ」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}Gespielt der Vagabund hat seine Roll'{/d},
ward aus dem Stück geschrieben meistervoll.
Es steht uns nicht zu, zu hinterfragen,
laut zu zetern: 'Wie könnt Ihr es wagen!'"
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
"Gespielt der Vagabund hat seine Roll',
ward aus dem Stück geschrieben meistervoll.
Es steht uns nicht zu, zu hinterfragen,
laut zu zetern: 'Wie könnt Ihr es wagen!'"
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« {mf|Mon Marchand Vagabond|Ma Marchande Vagabonde}, leur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}rôle est terminé{/d}.
Nous ne sommes pas en droit de dénigrer
Le script astucieux qui dirige cette comédie
Et vers un destin orageux dicte leur fin, bannis. »
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
« {mf|Mon Marchand Vagabond|Ma Marchande Vagabonde}, leur rôle est terminé.
Nous ne sommes pas en droit de dénigrer
Le script astucieux qui dirige cette comédie
Et vers un destin orageux dicte leur fin, bannis. »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Pek Berduş Tüccar, birisinin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}rolü gelmişse sona{/d},
Eğer değilsen budala veya ahmak,
Bu ustaca piyesin yazarını karalamak,
Ne sana kalır ne de bana."
languages.original_text:
"My Merchant Vagabond, their {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ArenaFaithEnding}part is played{/d},
It's not for you or me to denigrate
The artful script directing this charade
That writes them out — cast off to stormy fate."

traits.locale_text:
"Sevgili Berduş Tüccar, birisinin rolü gelmişse sona,
Eğer değilsen budala veya ahmak,
Bu ustaca piyesin yazarını karalamak,
Ne sana kalır ne de bana."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
